_sText:
This game involves the hostie mod. Terrorists can either go to the second floor and rebel or go to the underground and rebel. They can also obey the Counter Terrorists like hoes and follow what they say. The counter terrorists can use their wall to their advantage and the roof. The map contains S4S, GunToss, a Pit, Jails, but does not contain a Race. 

BETA2- Removed secrets and Added more lighting
